channel.title: Custom Armour
channel.description:
Hey..
Ive been trying to add custom armour to my client but need a but if help
I know how to add models and how to make them but i have one problem
I tried to make a custom PlateBody but the hands are behind the body and the arms dont exist
If someone could please help or give me a TuT i would be grateful
This is my current code..
[code] if(i == 10002) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 16; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 15;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 15;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = 1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = 1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Item Name";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Item Examine Info".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
- Thx in advance
- A-Person
Picture:
[IMG]http://i306.photobucket.com/albums/nn256/jimbob58_photo/WTF.jpg[/img]

item.title: Custom Armour
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

Tatemo:

If u add a model under platebody in the item.java it deletes ur arms and makes ur hands go somewhere stupid u have to make a model that includes arms and is animated so that the hands no where to go dragon-scape.co.cc has how to animate the position ur hands are in now is the default position if there is no animation.

Well…Wha?

Thought about making your reply look nicer and easier to read?

All i got from that is i have to go to a website and read a TuT?

Which one?? and where is it?

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Armour
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

If u add a model under platebody in the item.java it deletes ur arms and makes ur hands go somewhere stupid u have to make a model that includes arms and is animated so that the hands no where to go dragon-scape.co.cc has how to animate the position ur hands are in now is the default position if there is no animation.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Armour
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

GrimReapersScythe:

Did you make the arms onto the platebody model? Because the arms have to be a different model than the platebody itself.

What are you doing?? Getting your postcount up?

if i put them on it would show your hands backwards still…just with an image of arms being there so of course i didnt put them on…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @rs3andfsu rs3andfsu
item.description:
@rs3andfsu wrote:

rofl im sorry its just thats kinda funny but it looks kinda cool 2 why dont you leave that on there so if you ever make that server public you could say its a glitch or something lol but thats just my opinion some people may have different opinions and no i dont know how to fix this lol i know nothing about coding thats pretty much why i came to this website anyway but thats all i got sorry

item.description:
@a-person wrote:

Hey…

Ive been trying to add custom armour to my client but need a but if help

I know how to add models and how to make them but i have one problem

I tried to make a custom PlateBody but the hands are behind the body and the arms dont exist

This is my current code…

if(i == 10002) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 16; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 15;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 15;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = 1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = 1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Item Name";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Item Examine Info".getBytes();//examin info }
